bibl.title: Ancient Letters. Classical and Late Antique Epistolography
bibl.note: Paper read at the "Ancient Letters Conference" in July 2004, Manchester. - Relies mainly on: P. Oxy. XVIII, 2190; XXXIII, 2680; XLVIII, 3396-3397.
HUTCHINSON Gregory O., Down among the Documents: Criticism and Papyrus Letters.
Ruth MORELLO and A.D. MORRISON (Edd.), Ancient Letters. Classical and Late Antique Epistolography (Oxford, 2007) pp. 17-36, 4 figg.
